text: i have been banging my head around on this one…might be because its 3am but any thoughts as to what im doing wrong here would be much appreciated.

Just some trouble sitting steps, i don't see anything obvious atm. Does error still show with line 3 commented out?

Does module.services_filter have a default value?
Seems to be coming from line 4 when i take out the “=” error goes away but then i don’t have a valid query lol.
yeah it does have default value
so this is strange…it started working when i added a hubdb table selection field and passed the table id thru that way… odd quirk.
Very odd, glad you were able to get it working!
